element_text:
{"chunk": "In the event that lease incentives are received to enter into operating leases, such incentives are recognized as a liability. The
aggregate benefit of incentives are recognised as a reduction of rental expenses on a straight-line basis, except where another
systematic basis is more representative of the time pattern in which economic benefits from the leased assets are consumed.
Going Concern
After reviewing the company's management accounts to the date of the signing of these accounts and the company's forecasts", "context": "The chunk discusses the company's accounting treatment of lease incentives and its assessment of going concern, which are key accounting policies of the company."}
